stochastic_function: lambda investment_decision, current_savings, market_risk, economic_conditions: {1: 0.6, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.2} if investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'favorable' else {1: 0.2, 0: 0.6, -1: 0.2} if investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'low' and economic_conditions == 'neutral' else {1: 0.3, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.3} if investment_decision == 'invest' and current_savings == 'high' and market_risk == 'medium' and economic_conditions == 'favorable' else {1: 0.1, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.7} if investment_decision == 'invest' else {1: 0.0, 0: 0.95, -1: 0.05}
